price: 7. Waa intaasoo Allaah yeelo jaceyl dhexdiinna idinka iyo kuwaad collaytanteen ee ka midka ah (gaalada oo soo islaamaan). Alle wax walba wuu Karaa5. Allena waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: ۞ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَجۡعَلَ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ عَادَيۡتُم مِّنۡهُم مَّوَدَّةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ قَدِيرٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
category: She that is to be Examined
footnotes: 5. Inuu hirgeliyo tani ama waxa uu doonoba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ʿasā al-lahu an yajʿala baynakum wabayna alladhīna ʿādaytum min'hum mawaddatan wal-lahu qadīrun wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
